name: Time Travel Shanty
description:
A cursed gem causes out of control time travel! Created for GMTK Game Jam 2020: Out Of Control. Collect treasure, face undead skeletons and explore two worlds in one.

Made in 48h with Unity 2019.4 and Game Creator by Sebastian Graetz, with original music by Tunglith. This is my first ever game, I started with learning Unity and game dev less than three months ago, hope you can enjoy it, despite a couple bugs here and there.

Unzip and play the GMTK GameJam.exe

WASD to move, Left mouse click to loot and activate levers, Right mouse click to dash

(There is a bug that locks the camera after death, please restart the game if it happens... also the tutorial prompts are a bit wonky and there are 2-3 collisions that sometimes cause the character to fall through the terrain, and I didnt have time to fix it for the Game Jam)
